Name: Arabic Treebank: Part 3
Description: This dataset is a collection of 300,00 Arabic tokens with their syntactic treebank annotation and annotation on part of speech (POS), gloss, and word segmentation.
Derived From: part of the dataset was derived from Arabic Gigaword (LDC2003T12)
Tasks: information retrieval, cross-lingual information retrieval, information detection
Authors: Mohamed Maamouri, Ann Bies, Tim Buckwalter, Hubert Jin, Wigdan Mekki
